product_name: Mountain Hardwear Pandra Elbow Sleeve Hoodie - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering just enough coverage from the sun and wind, the women's Pandra Elbow Sleeve Hoodie from Mountain Hardwear is a great top to throw on for jaunts around town. Dri-release(R) blended yarns wick moisture and minimize odor. Flatlock seam construction eliminates chafe. he Mountain Hardwear Pandra Elbow Sleeve Hoodie features a small chest pocket. Closeout.
